Room.Name: Goldenrod Avenue/Brownhaven Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the end of Brownhaven Way, where it meets Goldenrod Avenue.
Room.LongDescription: Goldenrod Avenue is actually a narrow, winding little lane to the west, but seems to be a little wider as you look east. An imposing building is at the southeast corner of this intersection. A fairly new sign says its the tax collector's office. Across the street on the southwestern corner is the village militia's headquarters.
